distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for python-cryptography fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-36242: Using the Fernet class to symmetrically encrypt multi gigabyte
  values could result in an integer overflow and buffer overflow (bsc#1182066).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In the cryptography package before 3.3.2 for Python, certain sequences of update calls to symmetrically encrypt multi-GB values could result in an integer overflow and buffer overflow, as demonstrated by the Fernet class.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
